TopicTitle: [1.0] Super Sonic Plane Series (Over 1.4K M/S ASL) (United Aces of Jeb)

Articles.Content:
![7zLuMXX.png](http://i.imgur.com/7zLuMXX.png)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps comes the Super Sonic Passenger Plane Series. A set of 6 hyper-sonic passenger jets, each completely different:

-SSP-1 "Concord" is my take on what would happen if an SR-71 and a Concord had a baby. 

-SSP-2 "Spike" is the most irregularly shaped plane of the bunch. It was based off a plane I saw on google images.

-SSP-3 "Hilt" is a larger and more maneuverable craft

-SSP-4 "Mako" is the slower version of the "..." with the same exact layout just different engines

-SSP-4T "Whiskey Tango Foxtrot" is the fastest out of them reaching 1,440 M/S while flying less than 100 meters above the ocean (Cheats **NEED** to be enabled to use this craft)

-SSP-5 "Meteor" is the fighter jet with a similar top speed as the SSP-4T.

-SSP-6 "Gwalarn" is a VIP transport, Custom and border protection, or Electronic Warfare aircraft all in one carrying 16 passengers in addition to the 2 pilots.

![NKy2c4D.png](http://i.imgur.com/NKy2c4D.png)

SSP-1 "Concord" Specs:

It carries 20 passengers and 2 crew.

Weight: 34.7 Tons

Parts: 63

Fuel: 1940

Top Speed: 320 M/S

Price: $68,953

![orh6cIa.png](http://i.imgur.com/orh6cIa.png)

Weight: 33.6 Tons

Parts: 62

Top Speed: 320 M/S

Price: $65,958
